GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.17.15
GSD.description:
ubi: ubi_create_volume: Fix use-after-free when volume creation failed

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit e27ecf325e51abd06aaefba57a6322a46fa4178b, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit 493cfaeaa0c9bc0c79ce5751193d49fdac9aaaec. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ubi: ubi_create_volume: Fix use-after-free when volume creation failed
